title: If Jordan Peterson Died | This Little Corner - w/Pastor Paul VanderKlay
description:
In this clip from Pastor Paul VanderKlay's weekly Q&A, he answers the question of Anarchognostic Troll Grizwald Grim about "This Little Corner" of the Internet and Jordan Peterson's popularity waves.

December Leftovers with Pageau:  /watch?v=Knkx5sMK4D8
"our talk": /watch?v=uhn2ibaMTMI&t=2733s

TIMESTAMPS
0:00 - Logos getting strung out
1:06 - Self-Aggrandizement go ahead
1:37 - Authorial Intent
4:33 - Symbolism
5:22 - Paul's Tiny Corpus
6:22 - Infallibility and Interpretation - Collapsing Sam Harris' façade
8:06 - Highlight of this Clip
9:09 - If Jordan Peterson Died 
12:33 - This Little Corner Now
15:41 - Thunder Bay & What's Been Amazing
18:03 - Measuring Zombie Hordes & Thunder Bay Service
19:55 - Most Valid Church Promotion in 100 Years!

Source:  https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=m7JYuJc1TvI

Here's a Discord for people who don't hate me:
https://discord.gg/en9RuYuvqy

This is the charity of the most Jesus guy I've seen on YouTube, so if you're into donating to or investigating charities:
https://www.sharetanzania.co.uk/

Once upon a time, I told them I'd buy a shirt but they didn't have it with baseball sleeves. Therefore, I think I spoke this into existence. I now call it a vital part of the Truniform.
Truth Matters:  https://bit.ly/2CHsQBg
